content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5), and a pipe group connected to the offshore pump.

### Copper plate mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure the target location is clear before attempting to place a boiler. The error indicates that something is obstructing the placement at the specified coordinates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
